title: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow
featuredTitle: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow
description: The rise and fall and rebirth of Canadian comedy duo, Terrance and Phillip.
quote: It was the birth of Canadian comedy.
altHero: Terrance and Phillip as young boys, wearing Canadian mountie hats
alt1: a school class photo of young children, with one child in a spotlight
alt2: Terrance farts on Phillip, both are wearing bell bottoms and platform shoes
alt3: Terrance and Phillip in a photograph with three Playboy bunnies
alt4: Terrance raises a trophy in the air as he and Phillip are lifted up on the shoulders of a crowd
